trailingComments.value: * * Represents an XML parameter entity reference in a document type definition. * * An XML parameter entity reference is structured as follows, where * {entity} is the name of the entity: * * %{entity}; * * The {entity} value is a property of this node. * * XmlDtdParamEntityRef nodes cannot have any children.
